Refund Atomic Swap via Cosmostation Wallet
With watch mode, you can check the status of your account. \nTo enable transactions, add your mnemonics later.
Currently in watch mode.\nAll transactions are made available after registering your mnemonic phrase.
Need permission for SD Card for save your address QR code Image or wallet connect
Need permission for Phone State for push alaram service
Gaia 12k is deprecated and Gaia 13K is available\n If you select Yes, your wallet can use in 13k with same address.\n But your test coins are be zero. and delegate information are reset.
Transaction request failed. \nPlease check the error code and message.
Transaction request submitted successfully. \nAfter a few moments, the full results will be displayed.\n(Pending times depends on Tx fee.)
Decentralized network of blockchains powered by Tendermint BFT and ABCI.
Interchain service infrastructure for a distributed business ecosystem.
Fast and secure decentralized digital asset exchange based on Tendermint built by Binance.
First cross-chain DeFi platform based on Tendermint engine. Kava allows users to leverage assets with its cross-chain CDP.
Built on Tendermint, IOV builds a fast, secure and decentralized universal name service.
Cross-chain oracle platform based on Tendermint. Band Protocol aggregates and connects real-world data and APIs to smart contracts.
Only a handful of validators will process this Tx\n(Takes longer time to recorded on the block.)
A few validators include \"Cosmostation\" will process this Tx.
Most validators will process this Tx.
Support fixed amount fee for Iris.\nIris Hub will refund the remaining gas fee after use.
Support fixed transfer fee for Bianace dex.
Support fixed transfer fee for KAVA Chain.\nSoon update for custom fees.
Support fixed transfer fee for IOV Chain.

Only a handful of validators will process this Tx. Validators with a minimum Tx fee setting of 0.000001 ATOM or less must propose a block in order for this Tx to be included. Depending on which validator is proposing the block at the time of your Tx, there may be a delay in having your Tx reflected on the blockchain.

Minimum Tx fee is a value set by each validator. If a validator has a higher node Tx fee setting, it means that a higher Tx fee is required from the user in order to include the Tx in the block proposed by the validator.

Validators that currently accept this Tx fee: Polychain Labs, jackzampolin, Forbole, Cryptium Labs, BouBounNode

This Tx will be processed by Cosmostation and other validators with a minimum Tx fee rate setting lower than or equal to 0.0025. Depending on which validator is proposing the block at the time of your Tx, there may be a delay in having your Tx reflected on the blockchain.

Minimum Tx fee is a value set by each validator. If a validator has a higher node Tx fee setting, it means that a higher Tx fee is required from the user in order to include the Tx in the block proposed by the validator.

Validators that currently accept this Tx fee: Cosmostation, Polychain Labs, jackzampolin, Forbole, Cryptium Labs, BouBounNode

The majority of validators have a minimum Tx fee rate higher than or equal to 0.025. Most validators will process this Tx. Therefore, there is a higher probability of your Tx being reflected on the blockchain within one block time(~7 seconds) when you use a Tx fee rate of 0.025.

Minimum Tx fee is a value set by each validator. If a validator has a higher node Tx fee setting, it means that a higher Tx fee is required from the user in order to include the Tx in the block proposed by the validator.

Validators that currently accept this Tx fee: Majority(~80%) of validators.
You will be left with no available balance after this Tx. You will not have any available coin to be used as gas to make another Tx after this.
Tx fee is higher than your unclaimed rewards. Set your fee to a lower amount or try again when you have more rewards accumulated.
Would you like to link your wallet to Binance Dex Exchange?
Please check the contents and decide.\nIt affects your assets.
Tx is broadcasted. \nPlese check your Dex screen!
Can not connect to the network. \nPlease try again in a few minutes.
We are currently under maintenance. \nPlease check our community channels for more information.
New version available. \nPlease update to the latest version from the PlayStore.
Push alarm is enabled for detecting each sent & received tx with this address.
Push alarm is turned off. You can turn on.
Need permission to send a push. Redirect to the setting screen?
This message type is not supported by mobile.\nPlease check the MintScan Explorer for details.

This wallet is for KAVA testnet
(KAVA tokens in this wallet have NO value).

Cosmostation supports this testnet to give users the opportunity to use KAVA's Collateralized Debt Position (CDP) feature before being released on Mainnet. Please note that support for this testnet can be discontinued at any time.
After purchase, your coins will be sent to this wallet. You do not currently have authority for the wallet, but would you like to continue purchasing?
Please select a currency to make a purchase.

BIP44 for KAVA key generation will be implemented starting March, 2020.

If you created an address before March, 2020, please select [Original Path]. If you created an address after March, 2020, please select [New Path].

If you mistakenly selected the wrong path, it will not affect your original KAVA wallet. Simply press [Import Mnemonics] to re-select your path.
Do NOT close!\nTransactions are being submitted to each chain in order.\nPlease note that it may take longer than regular transactions.

This wallet is for testnet
(Tokens in this wallet have NO value).

Cosmostation supports this testnet to give users the opportunity to use new feature before being released on Mainnet. Please note that support for this testnet can be discontinued at any time.
BNB holders who mint the most USDX earn the most minter rewards! Every Wendesday at 14:00 UTC

The minimum rate at which the total USD value of the collateralized asset must be kept at against the total amount of USDX loaned from the CDP.\n\nFor example, if the minimum collateral rate is 200%, this means that in order to borrow 100 USDX from the CDP, you must deposit at least 200 USD worth of assets as collateral. If the total USD value of your collateralized asset falls below 200 USD due to price fluctuations, your position will be liquidated.

The amount of fee you must pay for taking out USDX loans from the CDP, calculated as APR.\n\nWhen you repay your USDX debt, you must also pay this stability fee in order to close your collateralized debt position.

The amount of penalty you must pay in the event that your collateralized assets are liquidated due to price fluctuations.\n\nIf your collateral rate falls below minimum collateral rate, your assets will be liquidated.
The amount of available %1$s in your wallet that can be deposited into the CDP as collateral.
The amount of %1$s deposited into the CDP as collateral from this wallet.
The total amount of %1$s deposited into the CDP as collateral.

The amount of maximum collateral capable of being withdrawn from the CDP without reaching a risk score of 95.\n\nNote that withdrawing the collateral excessively close to the maximum amount can put the CDP into risk of going below the minimum collateral rate and being liquidated.
The amount of USDX available for transactions.
The total amount of USDX loaned from the CDP.
The amount of USDX that can be additionally loaned from the CDP. This capacity changes in accordance to changes in the collateral rate due to price fluctuations.
The total principal as well as interest amount of debt that has yet to be paid.
Accrued CDP stability fee. The fee increases every second.

A risk score of 100 will cause your CDP to be liquidated. Risk Score is calculated through comparing the current token price of your collateralized asset against the token price at which the CDP will be liquidated.\n\nFor example, a risk score of 60 and the current token price of your collateralized asset at $10 means that your CDP will be liquidated if the token price reaches $6.
Borrow USDX by depositing XRP, BTC, BNB as collateral.\n100% on-chain decentralized finance.
This CDP will be closed. \nAll deposits will be returned to each depositor.
1/4 Broadcasting interchain send Tx from sending chain.
3/4 Broadcasting interchain claim Tx on receiving chain.
4/4 Confirming all Tx on each chain.
Do you want to enable fingerprint authentication?
No way to recover this. please remember!
Insert send amount and select token type
All information about this wallet will delete.\n If you do not backup your mnemonics, you can not find it again!
Delegate your ATOM and claim rewards with Cosmostation.\nFast and easy transactions with local signing!
Delegate your tokens with Cosmostation.\nStart earning staking rewards and contribute to the network ecosystem.
Losing your mnemonics could lead to loss of your asset. We highly recommend keeping your mnemonics offline in a secure location, and never share your mnemonics with anyone else.
Copy your mnemonics on a piece of paper and keep if in a secure location. You can recover your wallet using your mnemonics.
Gaia testnet is not fixed coin type, so skip coin amount check logic.\nPlease insert valid amount coin without under point.
This account has only address with watch mode.\nYou need add mnemonics for generate transaction.
To commemorate the launch of the main net, \nwe will hold a free 3-week event.
If you delegate to the validator you already delegated, the accumulated rewards will be automatically withdrawn and deposited into your available balance.
If you undelegate to the validator, the accumulated rewards will be automatically withdrawn and deposited into your available balance.
Rewards are accumulated each block.\nThe actual amount of rewards you receive may be equal to or greater than what is displayed now.

Claiming rewards from multiple validators in one transaction requires more fees than a regular transaction. However, using this function is less expensive than claiming your rewards individually from each validator.
We claim rewards from up to 16 validators in order of reward amount.
This node is not a valid Cosmos validator.\nThis node does not participate in consensus, and therefore does not yield any rewards.\nWould you like to continue?
You have redelegated to this validator in the past 21 days.
Once you redelegate TO this validator, \nyou will not be able to redelegate FROM this validator for 21 days. \nWould you like to continue?
For the next 21 days, you will not be able to redelegate from the validator you are redelegating to.
You can change reward recipient address.\nAfter change this, every claimed rewards are going to changed address. \nPlease confirm you have full authority with to change address.
You can change reward recipient address.\nAfter change this, every claimed rewards are going to changed address. \nPlease confirm you have full authority with to change address.
Do not set this as an exchange address.

The transaction you requested has been successfully broadcasted to the blockchain. However, there is a delay in displaying the result. Please press the "wait" button below to wait until the result is displayed, or press "close" to return to your wallet dashboard and check your TX in the history tab later.
Please insert PIN number for unlock
Please insert PIN number or using fingerprint for unlock
Your account looks vesting account, We suggest using cli commnad delegate and undelegate tx for correct amount.
Invalid mnemonic phrase, please paste correct 12, 16, or 24 words
Incorrect PIN. Please enter your PIN again.
Cannot send to your own address
Invalid amount, please insert correct amount.
Address or Public key is valid format but no data in block chain.
You rejected permission. Please enable permission.
Insufficient available balance.\nUnder minimum tx fee.
Insufficient available balance.\nUnder minimum tx fee.
The block chain was too busy to time out.\nThe requested transaction would have been performed. \nPlease refer to the history.
Token transfer is locked for three weeks following mainnet launch.
Not enough available balance for fee.
Currently only supports ATOM as Tx fee.
Delegation to jailed validator is not supported.
Please wait 21 days until your unbonding is processed. You will be able to undelegate again once unbonding is completed.
Exceeded maximum redelegation count.\nSelect another validator.
This address is already registered as your claim reward address.
This account has changed its reward address.\nYou can user re-invest feature after reset your reward address to self.
This proposal can only vote on validators.
This proposal can only vote on delegators.
Less than the minimum deposit amount.
Less than the minimum loan amount.
Cannot repay now. You need more USDX to Repay.
In order to user this feature,\nyou must create a %1$s account and deposit a small amount of %2$s to be used as transaction fee.
In order to user this feature,\nyou must create a %1$s account wallet.
